comprehensive_overview: libopus is a high-quality audio codec that is specifically designed for interactive speech and audio transmission over the Internet. It is part of the wider Opus audio codec family, covering a wide range of bitrates and applications.
core_features: Ultra-wideband audio support (from 8 kHz narrowband to 48 kHz fullband)
Standalone audio codec or used within other container formats
Support for both speech and music
